meanings.definition: A type of explosive device designed to cause massive destruction.
meanings.sent1: The superbombs exploded with a loud bang.
meanings.sent2: The military used superbombs to destroy the enemy's base.
meanings.sent3: The superbombs were so powerful, they made the ground shake.
meanings.sent4: Her anger was like superbombs ready to explode at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The superbombs lit up the night sky with fiery destruction.

meanings.definition: To detonate or use superbombs in warfare.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers superbombs to win the battle.
meanings.sent2: He decided to superbombs to end the conflict quickly.
meanings.sent3: The general superbombs strategically to outsmart the enemy.
meanings.sent4: The decision to superbombs changed the course of the war.
meanings.sent5: The commander ordered to superbombs despite the risks involved.

meanings.sent1: The factory specialized in the production of superbombs.
meanings.sent2: The government investigated illegal superbombs manufacturing.
meanings.sent3: The competition for superbombs production was fierce among countries.
meanings.sent4: The secret facility was involved in covert superbombs creation.
meanings.sent5: The technology for superbombs manufacturing advanced rapidly.
